roleset.name: able to be continued
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'sustain.01'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: This is also an important reason why economists have warned that China 's current growth pattern is not sustainable .

roleset.name: able to be suffered (losses)
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'sustain.01'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Although these financial losses were sustainable, the reputational loss was not, and a bank's reputation is right up there with its bottom line.
